subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Until Tuesday, with the crisis unfolding in Crimea, it was not clear that the United States team would have an opponent to face when it landed in Cyprus.
snippet: Until Tuesday, with the crisis unfolding in Crimea, it was not clear that the United States team would have an opponent to face when it landed in Cyprus.
